TEXT.English: Oh my, you're [CT_NAME]! I'm [OUR_NAME] and I'm happy to meet you! I hope we can be good friends and all live in peace and harmony!
Sorry, but I don't feel like chatting right now, [CT_NAME]. Don't forget to try again later, alright?
Sorry, [CT_NAME], but we've had one too many disagreements on very important matters. We can't make peace just yet.
Alright, I'm willing to overlook our differences and maintain the peace. Thanks again, [CT_NAME], for being willing to listen to reason!
Hi [CT_NAME]! Seeing you really brigtens up my day! What do you wanna chat about?
[CT_NAME], sorry, but I don't have a lot of time to chat right now. Tell me what you want, and I'll see if there's anything I can do!
These super-powerful magic weapons will surely protect my friends and allies. I hope I can count you as one of that small number of ponies, [CT_NAME].
I could really use this tribute, [CT_NAME]. What do you say to sharing it with me?
Hiya, [CT_NAME]! Could you see if this trade is to your liking? I would really like you a lot more if you could give this to me!
[CT_NAME], sorry to bother you when you're busy... I just wanna see if you could tribute this to me, please. How about it?
Could I ask you to share your precious resources with me? I'm sure I will be a big help to you, if you could just give this to me now!
Could I ask you for a small donation, [CT_NAME]?
The peace-loving [OUR_EMPIRE] needs a small donation, [CT_NAME]. Will you accept this request?
Hello [CT_NAME]! Because of your current situation, I think you should have a look at this trade deal... Would you be willing to accept this tribute?
Hiya, [CT_NAME]! Could you see if this trade is to your liking? I would really like it a lot if you were to accept my help...
[CT_NAME], sorry to bother you when you're busy... I really think you could use this offer of assistance! Will this tribute help you, my friend?
Wanna try this deal now, [CT_NAME]? I think you'll like this one...
Sorry to bother you, [CT_NAME], but I'm ready to end this war of attrition! I'd really appreciate it a lot if you were to accept my peace offering...
Would you like to sign a trade deal, [CT_NAME]?
[CT_NAME], I'd like to talk about our trade deals today. I'm ready to cancel this one, with your permission of course. If it works better for you, we could always renegotiate it....
I'm so disappointed in you, [CT_NAME]. Did my offer of frienship mean nothing to you? I can't just ignore when my friends start worrying... Clearly, you must be stopped! ([OUR_NAME] declares war!)
